Package uk.co.benashwell.CartoonDrawing

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ButtonListener
    The ButtonListener Class implements ActionListener and is used to listen to the button and set the appropriate filename.
    ButtonPanel
    ButtonPanel class extends JPanel and is used to create the different buttons found in the tabs at the top of the programme.
    CartoonFrame
    The CartoonFrame class inherits from JFrame class.
    DrawingCanvas
    DrawingCanvas class extends Jpanel and is used to set up the panel which will be used to place the images on.
    Driver
    The Driver class contains the main method that starts the entire program off.
    Image
    Class to hold information about image, that can then be used in the vector of pictures
    MenuListener
    The MenuListener class Implements ActionListener and is used to listen to the Frames menu and act to what happens in it.
    MyMouseListener
    The MyMouseListener Class implements MouseListener and is sued to listen to the canvas and then the mouse is clicked on it register its co ordinates and send it to the model.
    Picture
    A class to hold the image location and file name, also holds the methods to draw each picture.
    TabbedPane
    This class sets up the tabbed panel to be used to choose which image to place on the canvas.
    TextBubble
    Class to deal with and hold all the information about text bubbles, or any picture with text in.
    VectorOfPictures
    class that contains the vector of picture images, allows drawing and clearing of each element.
